Blackstorm:

Blackstorm smiled back and said "GOOD, altough I have to admit that 
I'm not good... You see, Perceptor said that I need to train before 
I go to slag Maximals. That means that my last fight with them... 
Well, they beaten me..."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> KitKat::
> 
> She smiled. The thought of several bots training ment she would 
see 
> whwt she had to deal with as her back up and possably help train 
> others in different fighting skills. "Sure, you may come along. We 
> will need a good bot to help us."
>
